greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = denominator of squared radius R^2 of the circumcircle of the n-th non-obtuse triangle with integer sides i <= j <= k <= sqrt(i^2 + j^2) in a list of such triangles, the list being sorted by increasing size of R. Numerators are A331222.
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Jan 12 2020
